## Plots

This is a report about long term stability by Bundesanstalt f√ºr Materialforschung.
The following pages contain plots:
\newpage


```{r, results='asis'}

for (i in 1:length(params$dat)) {
  kw_i = params$dat[[i]]
  com_i = params$c[[i]]
  
  # calculate month (2 steps)
  rt = kw_i[["val"]][["Date"]]
  mon <- sapply(rt, function(x) { mondf(d_start = rt[1], d_end = x) })
  
  plot_lts_data(x = kw_i, type=1)
  points(x = mon[!is.na(com_i)],y = kw_i[["val"]][!is.na(com_i),"Value"],pch = 24,bg = "red")
  
  plot_lts_data(x = kw_i, type=2)
  points(x = mon[!is.na(com_i)],y = kw_i[["val"]][!is.na(com_i),"Value"],pch = 24,bg = "red")
   
  
  # new page (both 2 lines):
  cat("\n\n\\pagebreak\n")
  writeLines("ValueForV")
}
```
